channel.title: Videos on Powerslacker
channel.description: Recent content in Videos on Powerslacker

item.title: Learn Javascript with a Simple Project: 'Rock Paper Sccisors'
item.description: So you wanna learn Javascript? The best way to learn to code is by coding! In this tutorial series I’ll be training you on how to build ‘Rock, Paper, Scissors’ with Javascript. You will learn the basic Javascript fundamentals so you can hit the ground running and build interesting projects of your own. This series is aimed at absolute beginners – people who are new to Javascript, and are looking for a quick, but thorough introduction to JS.

item.title: Auto Post to Craigslist
item.description: Just completed this tutorial on how to build a web bot that automatically posts ads to craigslist using Nightmare.js The goal of this guide is to teach you how to build web bots and web automation tools using Nightmare.js and avoid common pitfalls with proper planning, research, debugging techniques, and managing asynchronous code. item.title: Get Started with Nightmare.js
item.description: In this tutorial you will learn to build a screen scraper using node.js, nightmare.js, and jQuery. This will scrape all the gigs posted on craigslist in the computers section for any city you choose. You can hook this up to a cron job and email yourself the results at regular intervals. Video Code Github repo Dependencies sudo apt-get install node sudo apt-get install msmtp ca-certificates sudo apt-get install gnome-scheduler npm install --save jquery npm install --save nightmare -g Configuring MSMTP http://www.
